current.modal-text: Sign up and be the first to exclusive drops, special offers, and important updates.
current.faq_question_category_1: Is this product suitable for sensitive skin?
current.faq_answer_category_1: Yes. However if you have any specific concerns we always recommend speaking to your Doctor/Dermatologist before aplying any new products!
current.faq_question_category_2: Can I use the Tanning Mousse on my face?
current.faq_answer_category_2: Yes! All Peta Jane Products are safe to use on your face, as always we recommend a patch test before any application. You can also try the Peta Jane Mist underneath or on top of your make up.
current.faq_question_category_3: Are Peta Jane Beauty products vegan?
current.faq_answer_category_3: Yes, all our products are vegan and organically derived.
current.faq_question_category_4: Are Peta Jane Beauty products safe to use while pregnant?
current.faq_answer_category_4: Yes, all Peta Jane Beauty products are safe to use while pregnant. We recommend checking with your GP before using any new product during a pregnancy.
current.faq_question_category_5: What is the shelflife of Peta Jane Beauty products?
current.faq_answer_category_5: You can store your Peta Jane Beauty products for up to 3 years.
current.faq_question_category_6: Does the Mist last as long as the Mousse?
current.faq_answer_category_6: Yes, both the Mist and the Mousse last up to 7 days. The mist is perfect for touch ups over the mousse too!
current.faq_question_category_7: How long does it take for the Mist to dry?
current.faq_answer_category_7: It takes about a minute to dry just like our Mousse! Let it dry then get dressed and rinse it off after 6/8 hours!
current.faq_question_category_8: What’s the difference between the Mist and Mousse?
current.faq_answer_category_8: The application process is the only difference, the Mousse requires a mitt and the mist you just spray on. Our Tanning Mist only comes in a Medium shade, and our Tanning Mousse comes in 3 shades.
current.faq_question_category_9: How long does the tan last?
current.faq_answer_category_9: The tan lasts up to 7 days and will fade like a natural sun tan would!
current.faq_question_category_12: How do I clean the Tanning Mitt?
current.faq_answer_category_12: The Mitt is washing machine safe (just don't put it in with your whites). You can also handwash it and let it air dry. We do not recommend putting the Mitt in the dryer.
current.faq_question_category_13: Will using daily sunscreen fade the tan?
current.faq_answer_category_13: No! We recommend wearing SPF over your tan everyday as our products do not contain any SPF.
current.faq_answer_category_14: We recommend putting a towel down on the floor when you spray. To avoid it getting on clothes, wait a couple of minutes to dry then get dressed. No exercise, sweating, or water of any kind for 6/8 hours.
current.faq_question_category_17: Do you ship internationally? If so, which countries?
current.faq_answer_category_17: We currently only ship to the United States but we are working on expanding shipping to other countries!
